brief_title: Pyrotinib in Combination With Letrozole in Patients With HER2-Positive, ER-Positive Metastatic Breast Cancer
brief_summary: This is a prospective, single-arm, multi-center clinical study of pyrotinib in combination With letrozole in patients With HER2-Positive, ER-Positive metastatic breast cancer. Our aim was to explore the efficacy and safety of pyrotinib combined with letrozole in patients with HER2-positive, ER-positive metastatic breast cancer.
